Articles.Content: My favorite is Jebediah mainly because you can strap him in a chair during launch and he will still be smiling.

Bill, Jeb and Bob. I love those three guys equally.

But I don't want them to die, so I keep them on my Space Station. Four missions to the Mun, Two to Minmus, and a lot of LKO missions are more than enough for a retirement.
You forgot Scott Kerman
Kurt, cause he introduced me to KSP.
Kurt Kerbain
Philberry, I've formed a strong bond with him whilst sitting waiting for him to descend in an empty rocket...
MadDog just because he makes me chuckle with his wild eyed expressions.
Neilemone Kerman. He was my first Kerbal on Gilly and Duna and hasn't died a single time yet.

Derrim Kerman

Max stupidity and max courage, what can possibly go wrong?
Kurt and Jeb FTW!

Jebediah "laughing at danger" Kerman.

The orange crew is my favourite (and the one I don't want stranded. Well, they're on Eve now), but Jeb is the crazy cherry on top of the scared sundae.

I have a special relationship with Bobgan and Nedrie Kerman. They were at the head of my Mun & Minmus program, landing on both in the same trip. They also were at the head of my in-progress Duna mothership program because I tend to go completely overboard on my designs. I hate leaving the poor green souls alone.

Jeb is my gutsy test pilot.

Bob is my Rescue ship pilot

Bill is deadweight

Malsey Kerman. He is one crazy mother****er. I mean, he even puts Jebediah to shame with his glee at anything and everything happening around him.

Not to mention the fact he appears to multiply when I'm not looking; he's currently deployed on both Eve and Dres simultaneously.

Kirgan Kerman

He's the most serious Kerbal I've ever seen, and he's the only one I have who screams or smiles at the appropriate times. His courage and stupidity both at around 60%.
Burner Kerman because he seemed really insane and he likes to burn.

From my record file:

First Kerbal in space.................Merbree Kerman...Kerbcury 2
First suborbital flight...............Merbree Kerman...Kerbcury 3
First Kerbal orbiting Kerbin..........Merbree Kerman...Kerbcury 2
First EVA.............................Merbree Kerman...Kerbcury 4a
First free floating Kerbal............Merbree Kerman...Kerbcury 4a
First docking.........................Merbree Kerman...Kerbmini 5

First Kerbal to die...................Sheldun Kerman...Kermini 2...Parachute Failure

Note: Sheldun had exactly one flight. Every other flight (Kerbcury: 5 flights, Kerbmini: 8 flights) was Merbree. He's the friggin' John Young of my game!

At the moment, Merbree is my favorite, he is my Mun specialist. Epci guy, he clipped with a rock on minmus and said it tasted like crap, not like pudding. It made him a little bit sad. He still hopes that the Mun is made of cake, but it seems unlikely after looking at images of it. Jeb is a close second.
Kirrim Kerman. "Plan B" always worked for me!
I voted Kirrim because, well, Kirrim, but in my current save Henlin and Lanwell Kerman are reaching Jeb-like levels of badassery. Low stupidity, of course.

Good ol' German.

I swear, this guy's survived more test flights than I can count.

Shersted Kerman, though he hasn't been on my flight roster since 0.20.

While Jeb was on the Mun, he stole a Duna lander strapped it to an enormous booster, landed that puppy on Eeloo and never returned. I named a Mun crater after him in 0.22.
Mitbin Kerman signed up in version 0.21. I believe. Whenever I start a new game, I always edit him in and tread him with even more care than Jeb. It sounds so stupid, but I really like the guy.

Kirk Kerman (obvious reference to Star Trek (Unless it was actually a randomly-generated name )). I had made a new save not too long ago, and Kirk Kerman was the first on the list after the original three in the Astronaut Complex. I used Kirk in all of my high-risk missions.

Also, I shall not fail to mention Jack Kerman. I banished Jeb to Eve with no hopes of returning and replaced him with Jack on purpose

Billy-Bobfen Kerman He maned my first Mun mission ( although my youtube channel has Jeb on there as I forgot to FRAPS the first one) and he was the first one on Minmus. I am debating onusing him for my next mission to Duna or not, he is kind of valued on my long list of Kerbals. I made it apoint to hire a lot of them as insurance in case I did a lot of kabooms.
